name: Turn Based RPG Game
description:
Description:

Control a party of 3 heroes and explore 2 dungeons in this demo game featuring my newest Construct2/3 template. Play with its many features, battle monsters and collect items. I hope you have fun!

Game Features:
  • 6 different heroes, with their own classes and specific skills and equipments;
  • 2 dungeons with monsters and items to be found;
  • Play using mouse on computer or touch on tablet/phones;
  • Resolution 8540x480.
Controls:

Touch/click on the buttons to access areas or confirm choices;

Touch on doors/arrows on places/dungeon rooms to move;

Drag items to inventory/equip slots or on characters/player icons to use.

If you are interested in creating a turn based RPG game like this, I'm selling the template here on itch.io in this link:

https://zerotani.itch.io/turn-based-rpg-template

Feel free to take a look!
